data.eml:eml: A new species of Creagrutus (Characidae: Stevardiinae) from the upper Río Magdalena, Colombia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Albornoz-Garzón, Juan G., Conde-Saldaña, Cristhian C., García-Melo, Jorge E., Taphorn, Donald C., Villa-Navarro, Francisco A. (2018): A new species of Creagrutus (Characidae: Stevardiinae) from the upper Río Magdalena, Colombia. Zootaxa 4482 (2): 341-354, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4482.2.6
